links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2000
Index entries for sequences related to Bessel functions or polynomials
Index entries for continued fractions for constants
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 2100); x=contfrac(besselk(1,2)/besselk(0,2)); for (n=1, 2001, write("b051149.txt", n-1, " ", x[n])); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Apr 29 2009
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, E. M. Rains
